short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automated solutions for LI that allow you to keep the “personal touch” needed on that platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Linky Leads offers automated LI solutions, such as a default autoreply (example: out-of-office), as well as keyword-based autoresponses.
